channel.title: Rant on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in Rant on a neuro[log]

item.title: Facebook Posts
item.description: Posted to Facebook: It has recently been brought to my attention that I haven’t really said anything on here in a very, very, very long time and just post polar bear pictures. Very true. Well, there’s a good reason for this, and I wrote about it before I stopped posting and responding: I don’t trust Facebook and, worse, I would dismantle it if I could for what they have helped to do to our country, and many other countries around the world.
